title: Magnesium Fluoride-Engineered UiO-66 Artificial Protection Layers for Dendrite-Free Lithium Metal Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01428F, Paper
Kunik Jang, Hee Jo Song, Jung Been Park, Sang Won Jung, Dong-Wan Kim
Li metal is considered an ideal anode material for high-energy-density rechargeable Li metal batteries (LMBs). Nevertheless, sluggish Li+ transport kinetics and uncontrolled Li dendrite growth result in poor cycling performance,...
